original_text: God does not let men rule, if they do not respect his ways. He stops them from causing trouble to the people. God does not let men rule, if they do not respect his ways. God does not let men rule, if they do not respect his ways. He stops them from causing trouble to the people. God does not let men rule,
korean_text: 이는 경건하지 못한 자가 권세를 잡아 백성을 옭아매지 못하게 하려 하심이니라

sentences.original_text: God does not let men rule
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 사람들이 다스리는 것을 허락하지 않으십니다

sentences.original_text: if they do not respect his ways
He stops them from causing trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 그들이 문제를 일으키는 것을 막으십니다
